ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] refamiliarizing myself
ygData.msgSnippet: alrighty.....  as far a necro, bonechips are what you need as a regent for your pet.  other than that, for the most part, the same stuff applies for a necro as
ygData.messageBody:
alrighty.....  as far a necro, bonechips are what you need as a regent for your pet.  other than that, for the most part, the same stuff applies for a necro as for a mage...   int, int, and more int.  mages use malachite for the regent for their pet.  you don't say how long your break was, but I suggest you take a good look at the gear you have, as they have added focus effects to a considerable amount of the gear.  in akanon there are newbie quests for newbie armor much better than what was available when my ranger, mage, necro, sk, and shammy were lower levels.  allakhazams should have most of it listed, and who to talk to to get started on the quests... 
----- Original Message -----
From: Steven R. Hulse
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 14, 2002 12:42 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] refamiliarizing myself

After taking a long break from Evercrack at the Betty Ford Clinic I'm
back. I actually did forgat a few things and want to refamiliarize
myself, On the 3 bars that tell you your health and level status, I
forgot what the blue line is for. I know it has something to do with
your charma or something like that.

Also I just started playing with a Necro just to see what it's like. Any
good suggestion for getting Necro stuff? BTW I'm a Gnome.

What are the elements a Magician needs to conjure up a elementa pet like
fire or earth? I ran out and now I can't remember what I need to get!
What a dummy!  ;-)

Thanks again!
Durgaa
Shizney
